# alg

**Type**

The JSON Web Signature (JWS) header parameter that identifies the cryptographic algorithm used to secure the JWS.

## Declaration

```swift
string alg
```

## JWS header types

- **x5c**: The JSON Web Signature (JWS) header parameter that contains the certificate chain that corresponds to the key used to digitally sign the JWS.
